TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlInstanceCreator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract class that provides a means to store parser records for later instantiation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XamlInstanceCreator class is only intended for use by the WPF XAML markup compiler. ## XAML Text Usage

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateObject() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new object to store parser records.
